Data Fields
DiagLib_AdcChannelConfig Struct Reference
ADC Diag Lib

Structure containing input parameters for ADC software test. More...

#include <diagLib_adc.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t channel
 
uint32_t openDelay
 
uint32_t sampleDelay
 
uint32_t rangeCheckEnable
 
uint32_t averaging
 
uint32_t expVltg
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing input parameters for ADC software test.

Field Documentation

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcChannelConfig::averaging

Option for averaging the sampled data. Refer enum adcAveraging_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcChannelConfig::channel

Channel number from which input is given. Refer enum adcChannel_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcChannelConfig::expVltg

Expected Voltage after conversion. To be given in milliVolts.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcChannelConfig::openDelay

Delay between driving the inputs and the time to send the start of conversion signal. It is number of clock cycles of ADC clock and can take values from 0 to ADC_OPENDELAY_MAX.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcChannelConfig::rangeCheckEnable

Option to enable range check. Enabled if it is TRUE Disabled if it is FALSE.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcChannelConfig::sampleDelay

Sampling time/width of the start of conversion signal. It is number of clock cycles of ADC clock and can take values from 1 to ADC_SAMPLEDELAY_MAX.
